Generate 25 high-quality flashcards for the topic 'Legal Basis Documentation' (Topic Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > Asset Security > Data Security Controls > Privacy and PII Protection > Consent and Authorization Management > Legal Basis Documentation). NIST CSF: Risk-based (Identify, Protect, Detect, Respond, Recover). NIST SP 800-53 Rev 5: Controls catalog (e.g., AC-2 Account Mgmt, AU-6 Audit Review, SC-8 Transmission Confidentiality for asset security/privacy). Sources: NIST CSF (https://www.nist.gov/cyberframework), SP 800-53 (https://csrc.nist.gov/publications/detail/sp/800-53/rev-5/final), GDPR (https://gdpr.eu/), CCPA (https://oag.ca.gov/privacy/ccpa), HIPAA (https://www.hhs.gov/hipaa/index.html). **Instructions:** 1. Cover all Bloom's objectives, active learning (e.g., reference discussion/scenario), scaffolding layers, prior knowledge (data classification/asset inventory). 2. Balance: 30% REMEMBER/UNDERSTAND, 40% APPLY/ANALYZE, 30% EVALUATE/CREATE. 3. Follow schema exactly: Mix basic Q&A and MCQ. Tag each: {'bloom': 'APPLY', 'layer': '3', 'hierarchy': 'Level 6'}. 4. Distractors: Plausible per protocol. 5. Explanations: Cite sources, connect to real-world (e.g., breach scenarios). 6. Output as JSON array: [{'type': 'MCQ', 'front': '...', 'back': '...', 'tags': {...}, 'explanation': '...'}].
